reviewText: Great condition!  Replaced our worn out version.  Kids love this movie!  Fast Shipping!
Is this video gonna be made on dvd? I really like this as a kid but I no longer have a vhs player. Please help!

Loved this show growing up. Shows like this are almost wiped out. They teach children values, and lack the violence kids of now-a-days crave. My wife's grandmother said her grand kids had worn out three VHS copies of this one movie, and she couldn't find it anywhere else. I pulled out my phone and within a minute had located it on Amazon. It brings back many fond childhood memories, and her grandmother was happy to hear we bought her a copy!
Loved this movie as a child, still do. Very reasonable price for condition of product. Just wish the movie was on DVD.

My mother was really picky about what we were allowed to watch when we were children. This one passed. This movie is entertaining with educational tidbits stuck into it. :-) We quoted this movie over and over many years after we'd seen it. I was thrilled to find it and bought it just for the sake of reminiscing. Now that I have a daughter I look forward to sharing it with her.

It's a sad story, but it ends sweetly and has lots of comedic moments. I will not give away the plot, just see it for yourself!
great for kids so if you have a child or are a child at heart you might like it to happy shopping everyone
